channel.title: Plz omgf..help
channel.description: I got a noob called "SYIpkpker" ..he's logging in and crashing my serv for 10 time.. and i can't IP BAN or even BAN..because he's using diferent ip's each he logs in and changes the name each sec.. Maybe someone know how to stop him.. because that noob creates a lot of player "nulls" and they give a very big lagg.. If you got any ideas on how to stop him ..plz post
